name: A&N International Logistics - EAG Logistics - Buyer Beware - Freight Forwarding Scam
content:
They left us hanging high and dry. When good got to port he kept all the money we paid him to pay for ocean shipping, customs clearance, and delivery to our customer. Basically, we had to pay for everything twice. Buyer beware. May also be going under the names 
 A & N International Logistics, LLC 
 https://www.manta.com/c/mhxpz33/a-n-international-logistics-llc 
 https://www.aandnintllogistics.com 
 9810 Bianco Terrace, Unit A, Des Plaines, Illinois, 60016 
 Tel: 877-516-5216 
 or 
 
 5250 Old Orchard Road, Suite 300 
 Skokie, Illinois 60077 
 info@aandnintllogistics.com 

 Mark Lazar 
 EAG Logistics / EAGLogistics 
 8040 W. Lyons Street Unit B, Niles, Illinois 60714 lazar.mark@eaglogistics.us http://eaglogistics.webs.com/ 1-224-730-1577 --- EAG Logistics Mark Lazar Sales Manager lazar.mark@eaglogistics.us 8040 W. Lyons Street Unit B Niles, Illinois 60714 Tel: 1-224-730-1577 Fax: 1-224-730-1740 Contacts: Oceansales@eaglogistics.us Airsales@eaglogistics.us Docs@eaglogistics.us Mark Lazar General Manager lazar.mark@eaglogistics.us EAG Logistics - Mark Lazar, scam, scam, scam, crook, thief, dishonest, unscrupulous, scam, scam, scam, beware, EAG Logistics - Mark Lazar
organizers: EAG Logistics - Mark Lazar - Beware of freight forwarding scam
